titles.ar: كتاب الْعِتْقِ وَ التَّدْبِيرِ وَ الْكِتَابَةِ
titles.en: THE BOOK OF EMANCIPATION (LIBERATION), AND THE ARRANGEMENT, AND THE CONTRACT (OF SLAVES)
Chapter 17 – The guardianship is for the one who emancipates
Chapter 17 – The guardianship is for the one who emancipates

verses.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ حَمَّادٍ عَنِ الْحَلَبِيِّ وَ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ مُسْلِمٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ قَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) الْوَلَاءُ لِمَنْ أَعْتَقَ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Hammad, from Al Halby, and Muhammad Bin Muslim, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘Rasool-Allah<sup>saww</sup> said: ‘The guardianship is for the one who emancipates’.

verses.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ الْحَكَمِ عَنْ أَبَانٍ عَنْ إِسْمَاعِيلَ بْنِ الْفَضْلِ قَالَ سَأَلْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) عَنِ الرَّجُلِ إِذَا أُعْتِقَ أَ لَهُ أَنْ يَضَعَ نَفْسَهُ حَيْثُ شَاءَ وَ يَتَوَلَّى مَنْ أَحَبَّ فَقَالَ إِذَا أُعْتِقَ لِلَّهِ فَهُوَ مَوْلًى لِلَّذِي أَعْتَقَهُ فَإِذَا أُعْتِقَ وَ جُعِلَ سَائِبَةً فَلَهُ أَنْ يَضَعَ نَفْسَهُ حَيْثُ شَاءَ وَ يَتَوَلَّى مَنْ شَاءَ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Abdullah Bin Muhammad, from Ali Bin Al Hakam,f rom Aban, from Ismail Bin Al Fazal who said, 
‘I asked Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> about the man when is emancipated, is it for him that he places himself wherever he so desires to, and makes a guardian to the one whom he loves to?’ So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘When he is emancipated for the Sake of Allah<sup>azwj</sup>, so he is a slave of the one who emancipated him. So when he is emancipated and is made a freed slave, so for him is that he places himself wherever he so desires to and makes a guardian the one who he so desires to’.

verses.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنِ ابْنِ فَضَّالٍ عَنِ ابْنِ بُكَيْرٍ عَنْ زُرَارَةَ عَنْ أَبِي جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) فِي حَدِيثِ بَرِيرَةَ أَنَّ النَّبِيَّ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) قَالَ لِعَائِشَةَ أَعْتِقِي فَإِنَّ الْوَلَاءَ لِمَنْ أَعْتَقَ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Muhamad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Ibn Fazzal, from Ibn Bukeyr, from Zurara, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> regarding a Hadeeth of Bareyra that the Prophet<sup>saww</sup> said to Ayesha: ‘Emancipate, for the guardianship is for the one who emancipates’.

verses.text: أَبُو عَلِيٍّ الْأَشْعَرِيُّ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عَبْدِ الْجَبَّارِ عَنْ صَفْوَانَ بْنِ يَحْيَى عَنْ عِيصِ بْنِ الْقَاسِمِ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ قَالَتْ عَائِشَةُ لِرَسُولِ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) إِنَّ أَهْلَ بَرِيرَةَ اشْتَرَطُوا وَلَاءَهَا فَقَالَ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ ( صلى الله عليه وآله ) الْوَلَاءُ لِمَنْ أَعْتَقَ .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Abu Ali Al Ashary, from Muhammad Bin Abdul Jabbar, from Safwan Bin Yahya, from Ays Bin Al Qasim, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘Ayesha said to Rasool-Allah<sup>saww</sup>, ‘The people of Bareyra are stipulating their guardianship’. So Rasool-Allah<sup>saww</sup> said: ‘The guardianship is for the one who emancipates’.

verses.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ إِسْمَاعِيلَ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ الْفُضَيْلِ عَنْ أَبِي الصَّبَّاحِ الْكِنَانِيِّ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ فِي امْرَأَةٍ أَعْتَقَتْ رَجُلًا لِمَنْ وَلَاؤُهُ وَ لِمَنْ مِيرَاثُهُ قَالَ لِلَّذِي أَعْتَقَهُ إِلَّا أَنْ يَكُونَ لَهُ وَارِثٌ غَيْرُهَا .

translations.name: hubeali
translations.text:
Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Muhammad Bin Ismail, from Muhammad Bin Al Fazeyl, from Abu Al Sabbah Al Kinany, 
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said regarding a woman who emancipated a man. For whom is his guardianship, and for whom is his inheritance?’ He<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘For the one who emancipated him, except if there happens to be an inheritor for him apart from her’.
